Mailed 7/30/79 HEALTH ASSOCIATION BIOGRAPHICAL DIRECTORY OF THE AMERICAN PUBLIC HEALTH ASSOCIATION GALLEY PROOF 1979 Edited by Jaques Cattell Press Your information as it is scheduled to appear is listed below. Add only new data. Correct only factual errors. Be sure your additions are explicit and legible. Do not abbreviate. Please return this proof even if no corrections are necessary. DEADLINE: 14 Days From Receipt Robert Ely Shank Wash Univ 4566 Scott Ave Box 8113 St Louis MO 63110 **BIOGRAPHEE DISCOUNT** See order form for special biographee discount price.
FOR
OFFICE
USE ONLY		*1551756/N/0/000/1914/M/0
*306
551756 DGH Shank Robert Ely (48) F 23 b Louisville, Ky, Sept 2, 14. Educ: Westminster Col, BA (biol), 35; Wash & 24 Univ, MD, 39; Barnes Hosp, St Louis, intern & asst resident, 39-41; 25 Rockefeller Inst Med Res, New York, asst resident & asst res, 41-46. 26 L&C: MD, Mo, Am Bd Nutrit. Pres P&A Activ: Danforth prof & head dept 27 prev med, Wash Univ, 48- Past Prof Exp: Mem, NIH, Pub Health Res Study 28 Sect, 53-56, Surg Gen Army Adv Comt Metab, 56-60, Comt Nutrit, 60-72, 29 Chmn, NIH, Nutrit Study Sect, 64-68; mem, Nat Child Health & Human 30 Develop Adv Coun, 69-73. APHA Activ: Counr, APHA, 52-54, mem, Food & 31 Nutrit Sect Coul, 53-58, chmn, 57-59. Mem: Asn Teachers Prev Med (pres, 32 58-59); Am Soc Clin Nutrit (pres, 67-68); Am Asn Study Liver Dis (pres, 33 66-67); Am Med Asn (mem, Coun Food & Nutrit, 60-69); hon mem, Am 34 Dietetic Asn. Prof Int: Nutrition and pregnancy outcome: nutrition and 35 aging; prevention and control of coronary heart disease and 36 hypertension. TUVW Mailing Add: & Wash Univ 4566 Scott Ave Box 8113 St Louis MO 63110 Please sign and return promptly <::attestation: Signature Signature: illegible PAGE 001 7/30/79 Positioned at the bottom right of the document, with a signature line and date.::> SIGNATURE DATE <::attestation: Signature Signed Signature: legible (Robert S. Park) Please sign and return promptly SIGNATURE PAGE 001 DATE 7/30/79 A signature and date are present on a line labeled "SIGNATURE" and "DATE" respectively, positioned at the bottom center of the document, below the text "Please sign and return promptly".::> The editors will make every effort to assure accurate reproduction of the material submitted but reserve the right to edit such material on the basis of format, content and space limitations. Whenever possible, the biographee will be given an opportunity to check the listing before publication. However, in the event of a publication error, the sole responsibility of the publisher will be the entry of corrected information in succeeding editions. Return to: BIOGRAPHICAL DIRECTORY OF THE APHA. Jaques Cattell Press: P.O. Box 25002. Tempe, Arizona 85285 Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/mxfw0227
